title: Spotted: Santa Cruz FSA team racing carbon XC prototype, the Superlight is back!
content:
Santa Cruz hasn’t had a Superlight XC bike in the lineup for years, but that’s exactly what this prototype looks like. Getting raced now by the Santa Cruz FSA team on the World Cup cross-country circuit, the all-new lightweight carbon race bike has a familiar high single-pivot, now getting a linkage-driven shock. Complete details remain […]

The post Spotted: Santa Cruz FSA team racing carbon XC prototype, the Superlight is back! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
